lead_paragraph: The stores don’t sign long leases, stash away much cash or carry big credit lines. And consumers can meet the designers and touch their works, which cannot be done online.

headline.print_headline: Pop-Up Stores Thrive in a World of Failing Retailers
headline.main: Pop-Up Stores Thrive in a World of Failing Retailers

snippet: The stores don’t sign long leases, stash away much cash or carry big credit lines. And consumers can meet the designers and touch their works, which cannot be done online.
abstract: Entrepreneurs are revitalizing pop-up stores, decades-old retail concept that is expanding beyond seasonal deployment; pop-ups are seen as more fun and innovative than previously, and increasingly profitable, taking sales from big retailers.
